skills.name: RECIPROCATER
desc: • Deals one hit of physical, magic, and true damage to a single target.
• Grants Perfect Immunity to all allies for 1 turn, before dealing damage.
• Heal for 15% of your MAX HP.

skills.name: EVISCERATE
desc: • Deal 50% of your CURRENT HP in true damage to Revive all allies with full HP.
• Grants Increase DEF and MR to all allies for 2 turns.
• Grant HP Regen to self for 2 turns.

skills.name: GETAWAY
desc: Grant your allies a 35% chance to avoid damage when they are attacked. Failing to avoid a hit deals a percentage of their MAX HP as random damage.
